recipesJson.name: Green Bastard
recipesJson.author: YippYo
recipesJson.description:
...From Parts Unknown.

So I just got Guanabana (FLV) to try out the All Day recipe (highly recommend BTW) and wow this flavor is amazingly complex. I love it! Anyway I was just messing around and wanted to create my own recipe with it. After a bit of picking I decided on Kiwi (FA) & Sweet Guava (CAP). I found that these flavors are similar, but have enough character to stand out on their own. Mixed this up and wow. It's perfect as is. Very sweet & juicy tropical fruit profile. Reminds me most of a Starfruit. Mix and enjoy!

Flavor Comments
Guanabana (FLV): Originally wanted this to be the star of the recipe, but after mixing and trying it I found it's most present on the finish.

Kiwi (FA): This flavor is actually the most present in this recipe, even at only 2%. Meshes very well with the Guanabana & Guava.

Sweet Guava (CAP): This is meant really just to pair with the Guanabana but it actually adds quite a bit of character by itself. I believe it is also the main source of sweetness

reviews.text:
Parts unknown!
So I mixed this last night having forgotten why I originally bought Guanabana in the first place. Took one pull this morning and immediately came here to officially open an account to say, this is an absolute banger. Well done!
Absolutely delicious! Tropical, without being tropical? Smooth as silk and not throaty at all like most tropical type vapes. Well done!
Fantastic recipe that really shows off what a fantastic flavor FLV Guanabana is. It’s a great take on a tropical recipe while not going the typical tropical route.
Out of the gate this has to be one of the best tropical juices I’ve ever tried — mix this recipe!
Delicious. Mixing it for the third time tonight. Makes that sweet guava Pop ! Thank you !!!
Excellent 3 flavor recipe well balanced and full of flavor.

OMFG that is a great vape!  The kiwi gets gets all tangled up with the strawberry+pineapple-esque top half of guanabana and it’s all juicy and tangy, while the sweet guava drenches the funky, creamy, banana+coconut like base in sweet red wonderfulness. It’s like adding Hawaiian punch to a tropical fruit smoothie. I've had a very hard time putting this one down.
